title: Bohol Day Tour from Cebu
description:
If you're staying in Cebu, enjoy a day trip to see the best sights of BoholCatch a glimspe of the world's smallest primate - the tarsier!Take a cruise along the Loboc River while eating delicious local foodStand in awe as you visit Bohol's famous Chocolate HillsVisit a colorful butterfly sanctuary and stroll through a lush forest 
    See moreDiscover the natural beauty of Bohol's countryside on this whole day tour. Known for its stunning coral reefs, unusual geographical formations and the world's smallest primate, Bohol is a popular tourist destination with a lot to offer. Start with a convenient early morning pick up and hop on a ferry to get to Tagbilaran. Upon your arrival at Tagbilaran Port, you get to see the famous Tarsiers - these cute big-eyes creatures can only be found here. Enjoy your lunch aboard the Loboc River Cruise. Sail past breathtaking landscapes on the floating restaurant as you feast on savory local delicacies. Go on to see the famous Chocolate Hills, one of the region's prime attractions. Visit a Butterfly Sanctuary and go sightseeing at Bilar manmade forest. Your trip concludes with Baclayon Church & Museum and the Sandugo, the blood compact monument symbolizing the first treaty of friendship between the Spaniards and Filipinos.

title: Badian Canyoneeringg in Cebu and Kawasan Falls Tour
description:
Learn more about this activity's Enhanced Health & Hygiene MeasuresVisit a combination of the most famous attractions with a tour guide in this Badian Canyoneeringg experience and Kawasan Falls Cebu tourFeel the thrill as you scramble, climb, jump, rappel and swim through the rugged but scenic cliffs of BadianMake a splash as you brave through cliff jumping as high as 30 feet!Visit Kawasan Falls Cebu, a three-stage cascading waterfall and one of the most beautiful waterfalls in the PhilippinesShare the experience and excitement with other people or opt for a private Canyoneeringg tour with your friends and family! 
    See moreIf you've got a taste for a real, heart-stopping adventure in the heart of Cebu City, Badian Canyoneeringg is what you need. Badian is known for its Canyoneeringg or Canyoneering, which is flocked to by thrill-seekers from all over the world. If you are looking for more adventure, this Canyoneeringg tour also includes a visit to the famous Kawasan Falls Cebu where you can explore and enjoy.

title: El Nido Tour C
description:
Visit the unique Helicopter Island, named for its limestone cliffs resemble that of a helicopterDiscover Secret Beach's hidden natural wonders, explore the hidden beach and hear the local stories and history behind the Matinloc ShrineSnorkel at Talisay Beach and Star Beach, another fantastic spot to see the beauty of the coral reefs near the island 
    See moreThe beach culture of Palawan is rich in both natural beauty and local color. This unique tour will take you over the world-famous beaches of El Nido and to Matinloc Shrine. Your day begins with an early departure to El Nido Pier, where you'll travel to your first stop: Helicopter Island, which earned its name for its unique rock formations that give the island the appearance of a helicopter from a distance. You'll also visit Matinloc Shrine, which is also known as the Shine of Our Lady of Matinloc, a spritual oasis. After learning the stories behind this location, you'll have a delicious barbecued lunch and then head off to the Secret Beach. Hidden away from the shoreline, it's like your own private paradise! There's also the Hidden Beach which is an amazing, cove-like wonder fit for a fantasy novel. Don't miss out on the chance to see and swim in El Nido's finest beaches.

    See more The beach culture of Palawan is rich in both natural beauty and local color. This unique tour will take you over the world-famous beaches of El Nido and to Matinloc Shrine. title: Moalboal Cebu Island Hopping and Canyoneeringg Experience
description:
Book through Klook and go on a fun-filled, private tour around Moalboal Cebu!Visit the beautiful islands of this coastal town where you'll get a chance to experience its diverse marine life!Grab your snorkeling gear and get a chance to see Moalboal's famous sardine runGo trekking, climbing, rappelling, swimming, snorkeling, and even jump from 30-foot high cliffs while CanyoneeringgReward yourself with an exhilarating hydro-massage at Kawasan Falls in BadianA convenient round trip transfer from your hotel in Lapu-Lapu, Mandau, or Cebu City, plus a delicious dinner, is also included in this private tour 
    See moreMake the most of your trip to Cebu when you join this island hopping and Canyoneeringg experience in Moalboal! This small town in the southwestern tip of Cebu has been a favorite of many adventurers for years thanks to its natural beauty, nice beaches, and adrenaline-pumping activities. You'll start your fun getaway by being picked up from your hotel in Mandaue, Lapu-Lapu, or Cebu City and make your way to Moalboal Municipality on board a comfortable and private transfer. Soon your island-hopping journey will commence, where you'll visit some of the coastal town's breathtaking islands. Snorkeling gears will be provided so you can go on a short swim and get a chance to see turtles in the wild, or even the famous sardine run! In the afternoon, the exciting Canyoneeringg will begin where you'll trek, climb, and jump off cliffs, ending at the jaw-dropping Kawasan Falls in Badian. This private tour also includes boat guides and instructors, free lunch or dinner, and all the safety gear you might need for a fun and worry-free day.

title: 3 Day Cebu Highlights Tour
description:
Make the most out of your trip in Cebu with an extensive and exhilarating 3 day tour to all its major highlightsExplore the city proper and visit its famous sites like the Temple of Leah, Magellan's Cross, 10,000 roses, and moreTick a section off your bucket list and get to meet, swim, and take pictures with majestic whale sharks in OslobGo on a Canyoneeringg adventure in Badian and prepare to climb, swim, and jump off of ruggedly scenic cliffsFrolic under the sun and feel the dreamy white sandbars of Sumilon Island in between your toes 
    See morePack your bags, grab your best travel buddies, and get ready for a 3 day action packed Cebu adventure on land, into the water, and even, in the air! Kick off your exciting expedition by conquering Cebu's land destinations. Embark on a city tour to the most famous sites in town such as the Temple of Leah, Taoist Temple, Basilica del Sto Nino, Magellan's Cross, 10,000 roses, and more before heading over to the municipality of Oslob to visit the historic Oslob Cuartel. Make sure to book a comfy accommodation so you could rest well before conquering the waters of Oslob on the 2nd day. Prepare to swim with the giant adorable creatures of the sea and get to take pictures with them, just ask the guides on site for their ¡EEEEÅEEEEunderwater photography expertise'. After swimming with the whale sharks, make your way to the breathtaking Sumil

title: Boracay Helmet Dive Experience
description:
Stroll along the ocean floor and marvel at the colorful and exciting marine life on the ocean floor!Not a swimmer? No worries! Helmet diving does not require any swimming prowess or complicated gearJust walk normally as you do above water and enjoy an up-close look at the incredible marine lifeFeel safe in the hands of PADI qualified dive instructors 
    See moreGo on an amazing walk underwater with Boracay Helmet Dive experience. On this trip, you will get to stroll underwater just as you do on land. So if you've always wanted to dive but did not feel comfortable wearing a scuba diving suit or are not a confident swimmer,  Boracay Helmet Dive will let you explore all the beauty of the marine world without any of the risks. The experience will start with a thrilling speed boat ride to the dive location. There, you will put on the oxygen pumped helmet and go through a safety briefing. Then, slowly descend into the water and begin your wonderful discovery of Boracay's stunning dive site. Stand on the sandy sea bed, see coral reefs, colorful exotic fishes and so much more!

title: Panglao Island Hopping and Dolphin Watching Tour in Bohol
description:
Go dolphin watching at Balicasag Island, home to more than 11 species of dolphinsDiscover Bohol's most beautiful islands and white sand beaches - Balicasag and Virgin Island as you embark on this memorable island hopping tourSnorkel in the pristine waters of Balicasag Island Marine Sanctuary, and swim with numerous fishes and coralsGet up close with the marine species of Bohol while fish feeding at Balicasag ReefCruise to the tropical paradise, Virgin Island, a beautiful sand bar exposed during low tide 
    See morePanglao is a well-known tourist destination in the Philippines with white sand beaches, clear blue waters, cliff diving sites, and world-class diving sites. It is also accessible to other natural attractions and tourist spots of Bohol such as the Chocolate Hills, Hinagdanan Cave, Bohol bee farm, and more!

title: Sunset Party Cruise in Boracay
description:
This elegant yet affordable sunset cruise features a unique net down the side of the boat where you can rest and take in the island's golden hour while enjoying ham and cheese and non-alcoholic beverages.Sunset Cruise is one of the most popular activities in Boracay. 
    See moreExperience the most sought-after and cherished Boracay sunset aboard one of the best boats in the island! Enjoy the amazing views from its large deck while cruising the Boracay shoreline ¡EEEEÅEEEE from the famous white beach to the Crimson ¡EEEEÅEEEE Shangri-la coastlines.

title: Oslob Whale Shark Watching Experience in Cebu
description:
Tick off a bucket list experience: swim and snorkel with whale sharks in the PhilippinesEnjoy a scenic 3-hour drive along the Southern Cebu coastline accompanied by an experienced local driverParticipate in shark feeding and meet the gentle giants up close plus explore surrounding coral reefsAfter your whale shark experience, you may opt to climb up the Tumalog Falls for a truly amazing experience! 
    See moreReady for an adrenaline rush? Travel via private car charter to Oslob, where you'll get up close to the friendly whale sharks on your trip to Cebu City. This slow-moving filter-feeding carpet shark is one of the world's biggest fish - and a true sight to behold. On the trip, you will not only get to snorkel and swim with the whale sharks but also participate in the feeding of these gentle giants. You will need to wake up bright and early for this adventure and get to your hotel lobby in time for your 5:00am pick-up. The trip starts with a scenic drive along the Southern Cebu coastline. Once you arrive in Oslob, get your gear (provided if you select the Snorkeling and Swimming Fee add-on) and hop in the water for your whale shark encounter. You'll also be accompanied by expert local fishermen to make your experience a safe one. Afterward, you can opt to discover the hidden gem that is Tumalog Falls, and then enjoy lunch at your own expense before heading back to your hotel.

title: Honda Bay Palawan Island Hopping Tour
description:
Book this Honda Bay island hopping activity and see white-sandy beaches, beautiful waters, and great attractionsYou'll visit rich underwater gardens, a bat sanctuary, a picnic spot by the beach, and watersports attractionsGo on an island hopping adventure around Luli Island, Cowrie Island, and Starfish IslandSit back, relax, enjoy the seascape, and savor a delicious picnic lunch on Cowrie IslandThe package includes a convenient hotel pick up and drop off service within Puerto PrincesaEnjoy a hassle-free tour as entrance fees, a tour guide, and a buffet lunch are included 
    See moreHonda Bay is the place to be when looking for some fun in the sun, sand, and sea in Palawan. Kick off your adventure with a convenient hotel pick up service within Puerto Princesa. Once you arrive at the Honda Bay wharf, you'll be greeted by your friendly English-speaking guide and tour operator. Hop aboard a motorized boat and head off for Luli Island. Play along the long, flag-decorated sandbar and enjoy the calm waves on the shore! After that, you'll head to Cowrie Island for a picnic lunch and try different water activities such as snorkeling. Each person from the tour will get the chance to swim among the colorful coral reef or try the banana boat and kayak. But the best is saved for lunch at Starfish Island where you might get to see hundreds of starfish just beneath the waves. This tour will give you the chance to take a break from the crowded streets of Puerto Princesa and play in the sun all day. Go snorkeling and see beautiful underwater gardens by booking this Honda Bay island hopping tour! Play watersports, discover the diverse marine life of Palawan, and relax on the white sand beaches of Honda Bay, Luli Island, and Starfish Island.

title: Boracay Sunset Paraw Sailing
description:
See the beauty of Boracay from a different perspective through paraw sailingRide in a paraw boat with the gorgeous Boracay sunset as your backgroundRelax and take home hundreds of photos while gliding through Boracay's pristine watersShare this experience with your family and friends since the boat can carry as many as 6 people! 
    See moreBoracay is known as one of the most beautiful islands in the world, but one unique way to experience its beauty is through sailing! Avail of this sailing activity and ride either a regular sailing boat or paraw boat and glide through Boracay's calm waters. Tag your family and friends along and enjoy a serene afternoon in the middle of the ocean with your loved ones. Be sure to take lots of photos as Boracay's sunset is not one to be missed!

title: Coron Calauit Safari and Beach Tour
description:
Take a day tour to see the savannah of Coron teeming with African giraffes, gazelles, zebras, brown deer, and moreEnjoy a nice morning safari tour around Calauit Game Refuge and Wildlife SanctuaryVisit some of the enclosures to see the variety of amazing local wildlife!Assist the park rangers in the morning feeding of some animals like the giraffe at one of the stablesVisit either Black Island, North Cay, or Pamalican Island for an afternoon swim before heading back to Coron townConvenient hotel pick ups and drop offs are available for travelers staying in Coron Town hotels! 
    See moreCoron's very own African savannah has opened its doors for you to explore! This day tour will take you to Calauit safari and see a myriad of exotic and local animals. The Calauit Game Refuge and Wildlife Sanctuary will get you the chance to see giraffes, gazelles and zebras, even brown deer just like in Africa. Along with these beautiful exotic animals, you'll see unusual local fauna, such as the Calamian deer, estuarine crocodile, the Palawan bearcat and the Palawan spiny anteater. You will even get the opportunity to help the park rangers feed some of the animals in the morning, allowing you to get a much more personal experience. After your safari adventure, you will head to North Cay Island or Rio Aplaya beach to relax or take a well-deserved dip in the water. You'll have a convenient hotel drop off after a full day's adventure.
description_clean:

The Calauit Game Refuge and Wildlife Sanctuary will get you the chance to see giraffes, gazelles and zebras, even brown deer just like in Africa. After your safari adventure, you will head to North Cay Island or Rio Aplaya beach to relax or take a well-deserved dip in the water. You'll have a convenient hotel drop off after a full day's adventure.

title: Bohol Whale Shark Interaction with Countryside Tour - Whole Day
description:

Whale Sharks at Lila, Bohol! You will be picked up at your hotel and brought to Lila, Bohol. After the whale shark interaction, you will be brought to Loboc River for lunch then proceed to the rest of the Countryside Tour visiting Bohol's notable attractions - the endangered tarsier, the Chocolate Hills, Manmade Forest, and more.

title: 3-in-1 Puerto Princesa Sabang Adventure Package
description:
Explore the Puerto Princesa Underground River National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage SiteTraverse 800 meters across the South China Sea on a scenic zipline ride 150 feet above the ocean in Sabang X Zipline, the longest water-crossing zipline in the Philippines!See one of the "New 7 Wonders of the World", the longest navigable subterranean riverLearn about the Underground River from your friendly guide and audio guides available in multiple languages!Enjoy a delectable lunch at Cacaoyan RestaurantGo on a relaxing journey to land before time on the Mangrove Paddle Boat Tour, crossing over Sabang River and its century old mangroves 
    See moreEnjoy Puerto Princesa's best sights and activities on this one day tour that takes you to the Underground River, Sabang X Zipline and a Mangrove Paddle Tour! Start off your tour with a stop at the Underground River, a UNESCO World Heritage Site known as the world's longest navigable subterranean river. Learn about the Underground River as you look around and witness the untouched beauty of nature as you gaze at the stalagmite and slatactite formations and even a 20-million year old fossil of a sea cow! You'll then go on the Mangrove Paddle Tour and cruise through hundreds of massive mangrove trees and discover how valuable they are to Palawan's ecosystem. Expect your guide to point out the various animals like the monitor lizard/bayawak hiding among the trees and you can even try out the tamilok, an exotic delicacy that features a woodworm soaked in vinegar! Get a chance to go on the Puerto Princesa Sabang X Zipline, a zipline 150 feet above sea level that shows you majestic views of Sabang Beach and the surrounding areas, before enjoying a delicious lunch.

title: Cebu City Private Day Tour with Simala Shrine
description:
See some of Cebu's top attractions in just one day when you join this exciting expedition from Klook!Visit Simala Church and be in awe of its castle-like beauty, inspired by the churches in EuropeStop by Magellan's Cross, dubbed as one of the most important historical landmarks in the cityExplore the grounds of the Temple of Leah, a Roman-style temple offering gorgeous views of CebuEnjoy round trip hotel transportations for a hassle-free adventure! 
    See moreMake the most out of your day in Cebu and join this tour from Klook! This exciting adventure will take you to some of the most famous attractions of the location. Get to know the devoted Catholic faith of the locals when you visit the beautiful churches of Simala Shrine, Basilica del Sto. Nino, and the Metropolitan Cathedral. Learn about the rich history of the Queen City of the South and marvel at the beauty of Magellan's Cross. Stop by Cebu's Taoist Temple, a beautiful place of worship built by the city's Chinese community. Before your day ends, you'll also explore two of the most picturesque places in Cebu: the  Temple of Leah and Sirao Garden. Hotel pick ups and drop offs are also included to make your day as worry-free as possible.

title: Intramuros Bambike Tour
description:
Cycle through the streets of Intramuros, one of the oldest parts of ManilaHop on a bamboo bike (Bambike) made with durable and all-natural bamboo and Abaca materialsGet an authentic perspective of the Philippine colonial period from your local English-speaking guideVisit at least 5-10 historical sites, including Fort Santiago, Rizal Shrine, and Casa ManilaHave a sumptuous lunch buffet with live music after your tour when you avail one of the Half-Day Cultural packagesIf you've already tried the tours and just want to roam around exploring on your own, you may want to book our Bambike Rental and have your own adventure!Please note that all tours are for FULLY VACCINATED guests only 
    See moreCombining exciting adventures with educational ecotourism, a Bambike tour during your trip to Manila is surely something you'll never forget. Join this exciting tour and hop on a one-of-a-kind bike that's made with natural bamboo, abaca materials, and aircraft-grade aluminum for the connection points. Every bike is made by hand by craftsmen dubbed as Bambuilders, which can take up to four months or more each! Pedal all around Intramuros, the historic walled area within Manila, and see the historic sites of this ancient citadel founded in 1571. Learn about the unique history of the Philippines, particularly during the Spanish colonial era, as you explore the area with your local guide that speaks both English and Filipino. Visit at least five different sites, including Fort Santiago, used as the defense fortress of the city, as well as the San Agustin Church, which has been rebuilt three times due to wars and natural disasters. You'll even get to bike on top of the walls of Intramuros, which offers a great view of one of the oldest parts of Manila!

title: Coron Tour B
description:
Enjoy this private tour exploring in the comfort and safety of your own boatSwim in Barracuda Lake, a scenic lake surrounded by limestone cliffs located at the north end of Coron IslandEnjoy a tasty picnic lunch at the beautiful Banol Beach, a short stretch of white sand beach with pristine watersSnorkel atop the Skeleton Wreck, a sunken fishing boat, and enjoy swimming with the colorful fishesVisit the iconic Twin Lagoon, two saltwater lakes separated by a narrow opening, which invites travelers to cross through for an unforgettable tunnel experienceA convenient pickup from downtown Coron will take you safely to the start of your adventure!This activity is open dated and is valid for 6 months from date of booking 
    See moreSpend a day soaking up the sun and enjoying the beach life with this tour of some of Coron's best spots for island fun! You'll begin your tour with a visit to Barracuda Lake, a gorgeous lake surrounded by sturdy trees and a popular spot for many divers because of its dramatic temperature shifts. Strong shoes are recommended for this tour as the path to the lake itself can be difficult, but you'll be rewarded with a fun dip in the lake's crystal clear waters. This is followed by a stop at Skeleton Wreck, a sunken warship, where you can enjoy swimming with colorful fishes and maybe even touch the edge of the ship if the tide gets low enough! Enjoy a refreshing picnic lunch on the white sands of Banol Beach, surrounded by peaceful blue waters and the green trees, before heading straight to Twin Lagoon for stunning limestone cliffs and tranquil waters. You can even challenge yourself to an unforgettable experience by swimming through the underwater tunnel! The tour ends with a visit to Reef Garden for sights of beautiful marine life and corals, right before you are dropped off at your hotel by the shuttle service.

title: Firefly Watching in Puerto Princesa
description:
Get to see thousands of fireflies glowing in the dark in a rich mangrove ecosystem in Nagsaguipi RiverWitness one of nature's spectacles as you embark on a paddle boat and cruise along the riverIndulge in a delicious buffet dinner before your river cruiseA hotel pick up and drop off makes traveling to and from the destination convenient and easy! 
    See moreThe fireflies of Puerto Princesa are famous for being a breathtaking spectacle. This tour will get you right up close to this amazing natural wonder. You'll be able to enjoy a delicious buffet dinner before you climb aboard a boat and set off on an underground river. As dusk falls and darkness settles, the light show of the fireflies begin. It is only in Southeast Asia where fireflies glow in unison; they are a repeating, glowing beat, as seen through the mangrove trees. The whole line of mangroves and trees will be lit with flashing fireflies, glowing together, and so distinct that it is said that in these parts of the world, fishermen use them as a form of guiding system to find their way in the darkness of the night. Don't miss the chance to see these breathtaking wonders when you head to Puerto Princesa!

title: El Nido Tour B
description:
Discover Caves in Snake Island, known for its unique sandbar in the middle of the sea and visit Cathedral and Cudugnon Cave, where locals used to hide from Japanese invaders during World War II in theSwim in the clear waters of Entalula Island and see amazing rock formations!Looking to have more fun in El Nido? Then you might also want to try other El Nido Tours: El Nido Tour D, the El Nido Tour A or the El Nido Tour C! 
    See moreEl Nido is famous for its beaches, and there's not better way to se ethe best beach spots in the area than through this amazing tour. Your first stop on El Nido's white-sand wonders is Snake Island, a unique isle in the blue waters with a sandbar that gives it its iconic name, winding through the sea like a snake. Then it's off to Pinagbuyatan Island, an isle that is famous for its limestone formations that had been formed thousands of years ago. After lunch, you'll head off to yet another gorgeous beach at Papaya Beach. The beach is white sand, blue water perfection that looks straight out of a Hollywood movie. You'll then explore the hidden wonders of Cudugnon Cave. Watch your head as you move through the rock passageways and explore the gorgeous natural caverns of this rock formation. El Nido is rich in untouched natural splendor, and this is a tour that will endure in your memories.

title: Coron Tour A
description:
Enjoy this private tour exploring in the comfort and safety of your own boatSwim in Kayangan Lake, the cleanest lake in the PhilippinesMore popularly known as the Blue Lagoon, this lake is set amongst majestic limestone cliffsSnap a photo with the iconic view of Coron as your backdrop during your short trek to Kayangan LakeSnorkel in the coral garden and explore the thriving corals and marine species of PalawanRelax by the powdery white sands of CYC Beach, where you can also swim or snorkel by the crystal clear waterA convenient pick up from downtown Coron will take you safely to the start of your adventure!This activity is open dated and is valid for 6 months from date of booking 
    See moreGo on a day of relaxation and discovery in this tour of Coron, where you'll be able to visit its idyllic islands and lakes and explore all the fun activities it has in store! Start off your day by soaking up the morning sun on the powdery white sands of CYC Beach or taking a refreshing dip in its cool, crystal clear waters before going for some snorkeling in the Coral Garden for thriving corals and diverse marine species. Enjoy a tasty lunchtime picnic at Atwayan Beach to reenergize and go snorkeling at Siete Pecados, you'll end the tour with some time at Kayangan Lake, known as the cleanest lake in the Philippines. Be sure to take photos of this gorgeous lake, with its mixture of turquoise and light-green waters, as well as the sturdy trees and towering limestone formations that surround this picturesque beauty!

title: Private Cebu & Mactan Twin City Tour
description:
See historic sites like Magellan's Cross and Santo Nino Basilica from the Spanish colonial eraGet a moment of peace as you discover a quiet Taoist TempleVisit a local guitar factory and understand why Cebu is home of the finest guitar craftsmanshipSee the Yap-San Diego Ancestral house built during the late 17th century by Chinese merchantsCover the major tourist sights of the Queen City of the South - perfect for first time visitors to Cebu! 
    See moreFollow the footsteps of the famous Portuguese explorer Ferdinand Magellan and explore the shores of Cebu and Mactan. Start with a scenic drive past the North Reclamation Area, Cebu International Convention Center, Mandaue City and the Mandaue-Mactan Bridge. On this trip, you will get to visit some of the area's most iconic attractions: the sanctuary of Birhen Sa Regla Shrine, Cebu City Fort San Pedro, Santo Nino Shrine and more. See the famous Magellan's Cross, an important symbol of Cebu planted on Magellan's orders in 1521. Explore the Heritage Shrine and Yap San Diego Ancestral House before completing the tour with some quiet time at a Taoist Temple and a visit to the famous guitar factory.

title: Coron Ultimate Island Day Tour
description:
Enjoy this private tour exploring in comfort and safetySpend a day with views of the towering limestone cliffs and incomparable aquamarine lagoons of CoronVisit the picturesque Kayangan Lake or swim in a hole below a rocky outcrop leading to the Big LagoonGo snorkeling in Coral garden and swim with the colorful fishes and coralsEnjoy a nice picnic lunch with the backdrop of the crystal clear turquoise watersYou'll get a convenient hotel pick up and drop off if your hotel is in downtown Coron!Want to include Barracuda Lake in your itinerary? Try our Coron Super Ultimate Tour instead! 
    See morePalawan is rich in beautiful islands, and this tour of Coron's isles will be the best way for you to experience the paradise in as many of them as possible. From your hotel, you'll head first to Kayangan Lake, a picture-perfect body of clear blue water that you could see all the way to the bottom. Then, you'll head off to the Twin Lagoons, surrounded by rocky cliffsides and full of bluegreen waters straight out of a fairytale. Your next stop is at Siete Pecados Marine Park, which is a protected area that holds numerous species and varieties of the local marine life, perfect for snorkeling. Here you can check out Skeleton Wreck, where you can marvel at an underwater shipwreck covered in barnacles. You will head onto the Coral Garden, which will give you the chance to observe the beautiful varieties of coral under Coron's waters, and even see how vital they are to the ecosystem! Lunchtime at Atwayan Beach will give you the chance to enjoy delicious local food as you relax on the white sands and enjoy the coastal atmosphere. Finally, you'll head to the Coron Youth Club Beach, a delightful beach experience in a tiny island, letting you feel as though you're the ruler of your own personal beach world. This tour is an amazing opportunity to see the very best of Coron all in one day!

title: Mactan Water Sports Activities in Cebu
description:
Satistfy the adrenaline junkie in you and choose between exciting watersports activities like parasailing, banana road riding, wakeboarding and many more!Marvel at the spectacular coastline of Mactan while parasailing above, getting incomparable viewsFeel the rush and drive a jetski freely across the pristine oceanRide the banana boat, a great way for a group to get an exciting and high-speed ride on the oceanMaximize the day and choose the best-selling 3 in 1 Package or 5 in 1 PackageFeel safe and at ease with professional equipment and a life jacket provided for you in each activity 
    See moreThrill seekers in Mactan will get their fill of water adventures in this 3 for 1 package or 5 in 1 package that gives them passes to three or five amazing water activities: parasailing, jet ski riding, banana boat riding, and more! Hotel pick up and drop off is included in the package, along with comfortable, safe, professional equipment, so the only thing you'll have to worry about is which adrenaline-pumping ride to go on first! Parasailing will have you soaring over Mactan's blue waters, fighting the wind as you see gorgeous views of the island from the height. You'll feel like you're in a real life adventure movie as you roar over the waters in the jet ski ride, racing over waves and feeling the thrill of the high speed chase. If you're going with a group looking for another high-speed ride, the banana boat is one way for you all to experience the fast life over water! This is the perfect package for adventurers looking for some fast thrills in Macatan

title: Puerto Princesa City Heritage Tour
description:
Visit the Roman Catholic Immaculate Concepcion Cathedral and learn it's rich historyRoam the Palawan Wildlife Rescue and Conservation Center and see Philippine crocodiles!See how hand-woven products are made in Binuatan Creations Traditional Weaving CenterIndulge your sweet tooth as you visit Baker's Hill, famed for its baked goodies and treats!Get a panoramic view of  Puerto Princesa City at the Mitra's RanchVisit the Plaza Cuartel and listen to the fascinating history and events that occured thereYou'll get picked up and dropped off right at your hotel in a convenient, hassle free transfer! 
    See morePuerto Princesa is more than its scenic surroundings and beautiful beaches; it's also a location full of amazing cultural locations that are vital to every tourist's visit. Your first stop, the Palawan Wildlife Rescue and Conservation Center, is a valuable sanctuary that protects the fauna found within the region. You'll not only be able to observe the Philippine crocodiles, but also other animals such as ostriches and bearcats. Then it's off to Mitra's Ranch, which gives you a spectacular panoramic view of Puerto Princesa. You'll find yourself craving for a sweet treat when you hit your next spot at Baker's Hill, which is famed all over the Philippines for its sweets, with everything from cashew nuts, hopia, brownies, and more local delicacies that are perfect for snacking and bringing home as souvenirs. At Binatuan Creations' Weaving Loom Center, you'll be able to see and even try making handloom woven products and items made from indigenous fibers, which are vital to local economy. You'll then visit the Immaculate Concepcion Cathedral, a historically poignant location which held the first Catholic Mass in Puerto Princesa during the Spanish Era. More Spanish-era history will be found in the Plaza Cuartel, used as a garrison by Spanish soldiers in WW2. You'll end the tour with time to relax with a stroll down the Promenade and Baywalk, with time to step into the souvenir shops for gifts.

title: Villa Escudero Resort Tour from Manila
description:
Get to know Filipino culture like never before when you visit Villa Escudero Plantations and Resort on a day tour from Manila!Enjoy a sumptuous Filipino food buffet for lunch at Labasin Waterfalls RestaurantWander around the huge expanse of the resort and meet various bird species along the wayWatch the cultural presentation to witness the legacies of the Philippines come to life during the Philippine Experience ShowComplete this fun trip as you try the other activities included: a carabao ride, museum tour, bamboo rafting, and access to the swimming pool and outdoor recreational facilitiesThis activity is open dated and is valid for up to 1 year from the date of purchase so you can schedule your vacation trip accordingly 
    See moreExperience the country life in the Philippines and Laguna's cultural heritage with an unforgettable day tour at a former sugarcane plantation, the Villa Escudero Plantations and Resort! Conveniently located at KM 91, Tiaong, Quezon near Manila, this summer destination has a worldwide reputation of being the center for Philippine culture and history, becoming one of the popular tourist attractions in San Pablo City.

title: Sohoton-Bucas Grande Tour in Siargao
description:
Have the ultimate beach day in the Philippines when you join this tour of Siargao IslandVisit Sohoton Cove, known for its beautiful scenery, emerald waters, and jellyfish sanctuaryA sumptuous lunch, friendly local guide, and comfortable boat transfers are all included in this tourExplore large caves in Socorro and see crystals glimmer in the darkGo base-jumping or take a slide all the way to Tiktikan lagoon 
    See moreDiscover the natural wonders of Siargao Island when you join Sohoton-Bucas Grande Tour! This full-day exploration will start at Bucas Grande Island with a Sohoton Cove tour at Sohoton Cove National Park. Here you'll visit its famous jellyfish sanctuary, explore Hagukan Cave, and stop by a cliff diving area where you can go for an exhilarating jump! You can also spend the day swimming, snorkeling, and taking photos to your heart's content! A friendly tour guide, delicous lunch, and boat transfers are all included for a fantastic day.

title: El Nido Tours in a Luxury Catamaran
description:
Sail across El Nido like a VIP when and hop onboard El Nido Yachting Club's luxurious 50ft. catamaranTry a variety of activities all throughout the day including swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, and moreEnjoy convenient round trip hotel transfers included in this activity for a hassle-free vacationExperience El Nido's Tour D to see the famed Small Lagoon, Cadlao Lagoon, Secret Beach (Private Beach), and Seven Commandos Beach! 
    See moreEl Nido is famous for its island hopping activities, allowing visitors to see and explore more of the paradise. But instead of joining the usual tours offered around the area, why not level up your vacation and book this adventure from Klook! You'll board a fancy catamaran care of El Nido Yachting Club and experience the famous Tour D. Some of the places you'll visit include the Small Lagoon, Cadlao Lagoon, Pasandigan Cove, Paradise Beach, and Ipil Beach. You can also try a variety of aquatic activities including snorkeling, swimming, and kayaking while wandering across El Nido. A delectable lunch, guide, and round trip transportation are all included to complete your day.

title: Nature Tour in Davao
description:
Go on an adventure in Davao with this Day Davao Nature Tour with roundtrip transfersDrink in the natural beauty of Davao as you explore the amenities, attractions, and views of Eden Nature Park, Malagos Garden Resort, Crocodile Park and Zoo and more!Cap off the day with relaxing view of Davao City at Jack's Ridge Resort 
    See moreLife is here in Davao! Come, visit and experience Davao's melting pot of culture and be amazed with the city's colorful history, clean and green environment and the Dabawenyo's brand of hospitality with our 1 Day Davao Nature Tour. Be one with nature and experience the fusion of flora and fauna at Malagos Garden Resort with their Bird Feeding Dome, Chocolate Museum, Museo de Mariposa, Butterfly Sanctuary and Mindanao Contemporary Art Gallery. Plus, be entertained with their interactive bird show featuring birds of varied species.  Drool over their wide selection of food found in abundant flavors, carefully prepared with fresh raw ingredients at their 10-Station Lunch Buffet. Become acquainted with nature and indulge in an authentic mountain experience marked with cool crisp of mountain air with Eden Nature Park and Resort. Here, you can discover and enjoy new adventures with their vairous SKY activities or relax and savor the true beauty of nature with their guided shuttle tour or simply sit back and entertain your thoughts at their garden filled with beautiful flowers and plants. Then cap off the day with relaxing view of Davao City  at Jack's Ridge Resort. Indeed, our Davao City Nature Tour offers a diverse collection of sight, sounds, key attractions, adventures and sumptous food and fruit choices. Life is indeed here!

title: Mount Mayon SkyDrive ATV Experience in Albay
description:
Be in awe as you see the world famous cone-shaped volcano, Mount Mayon!Explore this wonder like no other as you hop on an ATV for a one-of-a-kind thrilling adventure from its foothillExperience nature at its finest as you go through forests, rivers, rice fields, and thousands of volcanic rocks along these exciting trailsChoose from 6 exclusive and breathtaking trails that will surely leave you speechlessThere's no better way to kick off your Bicol trip than riding your way up to the Philippines' most iconic volcano! 
    See moreExplore one of the most iconic natural landmarks in the Philippines, Albay's Mount Mayon! The volcano, which is known for being almost perfectly cone-shaped, has been attracting many local and foreign tourists. Witness the scenic landscape aboard your ATV. Kick off the journey with a safety briefing and practice driving at the starting point within Cagsawa Ruins Park, which happens to be a popular tourist site in the province. Choose among five different packages that will let you explore the dramatic beauty of previous lava flows. You will be accompanied by a friendly ATV guide, so you don't have to worry about driving on some of the challenging trails. Take your family and friends to a fun-filled trip while staying in Albay!

title: Boracay Paraw Sailing
description:

title: UFO Inflatable Activity in Boracay
description:
Make your Boracay vacation a memorable and exciting one with these unique watersport activities!Rip through waves on your inflatable spaceship while being pulled by a speedboat at 30kphChoose between the UFO or Hurricane inflatables, depending on how you want to be swept, twirled, or pulled by the speedboat!Enjoy drops of seawater on your face and the laughter all around as you go through this ride with your gangLocal safety guides are readily available and all participants will be given life jackets! 
    See moreBoracay is known as a heavenly paradise perfect for relaxation and lounging under the sun. But if you want to amp up your vacation and turn your humdrum trip to an exciting one, you can scream and laugh out loud with your friends when you join this UFO activity in Boracay! Sit on an inflatable spaceship and hold on tight as you get towed through Boracay's waters in as fast as 30kph. No need to worry about your safety as gears and life jackets will be provided. All you need to do is bring your family and friends, scream your hearts out, and have a great time!

title: Discover Scuba Diving by WaterColors
description:
Learn about the equipment and the proper method of breathing underwater with your gearFeel at ease with the careful constant guidance of your PADI certified Dive MasterExplore the depths of the ocean, corals and the thriving marine life in BoracayNo previous experience required and you don't even need to be able to swim! 
    See moreBoracay isn't just home to some of the most famous beaches in the Philippines. It's also one of the best scuba diving spots in the country. A diving experience here will allow you to get a glimpse of the rich biodiversity thriving under the beautiful blue waters. This spectacular scuba diving adventure, you won't even need to know how to swim; under the guidance of a PADI certified dive master, beginners will be able to take part in the underwater adventure. You have the option of going in the morning or the afternoon. Throughout the experience, a PADI-certified master diver will teach you everything you need to know about your gear and scuba diving, ensuring that even beginners can follow along. You start with a scuba diving video instruction before you get a more in depth lecture and presentation, with various media to guide you. You won't dive in right away, though! You start in shallow water so you can practice those skills. And once you're ready, it's time to go out on a boat and explore the gorgeous coral reefs and richly diverse underwater ecosystems under the water. This is an amazing opportunity not just to learn how to scuba dive, but also to have a truly safe and remarkable experience in the waters of Boracay.

description:

With COVID-19 restrictions, all community events are held at an outdoor space and with a controlled number of people to ensure your top-most safety. 
    See moreThere's always something about Boracay to discover! If you're heading to this gorgeous island soon, one spot you need to check out is Station X. A vibrant and friendly hub where locals and tourists gather for a unique twist on the island's best offerings, Station X is a go-to destination if you're craving for a new Boracay experience. Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, indulge on delicious food, or simply seeking a feed-worthy spot, Station X will welcome you and be your haven.

title: Coron Tour C
description:
Enjoy this private tour exploring in the comfort and safety of your own boatCruise to Malcapuya Island and enjoy the panaramic views of coastal cliffs along the wayBask in the beauty of the pristine beaches of Palawan and its fine, white sandSwim through the coral reefs and thriving marine biodiversity of Palawan and even see numerous giant clams!Take a walk in Ditaytayan Island's sand bar and be mesmerized with the surrounding tropical viewsA convenient pickup from downtown Coron will take you safely to the start of your adventure! 
    See moreSeas the day and enjoy the beach life in this day tour of Coron's beaches, where you'll get to explore three of Coron's most beautiful beaches in just one day! Start your day off with a boat ride to Malcapuya Island, where you'll enjoy the panoramic views of coastal cliffs as you make your way. Once you arrive, you'll have a couple of hours to explore the secluded beach, including its powdery white sands and crystal clear waters, before enjoying a quiet picnic lunch that will refresh and reenergize you for the rest of the day! You'll then travel to Coco Beach, where you can relax under the beach's shady trees adorned with hammocks and swings, and enjoy swimming in the cool waters as fish swarm all around you! End the tour with a stop at Ditaytayan Sandbar, where you'll get to walk on its sand bar and admire the stunning surrounding tropical views.

title: Samal Island Tour in Davao
description:
Explore unique beaches and attractions of Samal Island with this 1 Day Samal Island Tour with round-trip transfersTour and relax at Samal Island's beautiful destinations like Vanishing Island, Kaputian Beach, and Paradise Island Park and Beach ResortExplore the island's top attractions, Monfort Bat Sanctuary and Hagimit Falls 
    See moreLife is here in Davao! Come, visit and experience Davao's melting pot of culture and be amazed with the city's colorful history, clean and green environment and the Dabawenyo's brand of hospitality with our 1 Day Samal Island Tour. Best known for its white sand beaches, Samal Island also offers a unique attraction with Monfort Bat Sanctuary amd Hagimit Falls. Be sure to pack you best swimwears and sun protectors as we take you at the stunning Vanishing Island and Kaputian Beach Resort. And before the tour ends, we will bring you to Paradise Island Park and Beach resort where you can spend the rest of the tour enjoying the sun and sea and relaxing with nature. Indeed, our Samal Island Tour offers a diverse collection of sight, sounds, key attractions, adventures and sumptous food and fruit choices. Life is indeed here!

title: Coron Town Half Day Tour
description:
Explore the beautiful town of Coron in comfort and safety through this private tour and visit the best of its sightseeing stops in half a dayClimb over 700 steps to reach the top of Mt. Tapyas and get rewarding views overlooking CoronTake a quick dip at the Maquinit Hotspring, one of the few saltwater hot springs in the worldHave a look around the public market and souvenir shops, and see numerous local arts and craftsVisit the iconic landmarks of the town, such as the Town Plaza, Lualhati Park and St. Augustine ChurchEnjoy convenient hotel transfers within Coron Town! 
    See moreThere is far more to Coron than just the beaches and islands that it has been been famous all over the world for. This half day tour will bring you to the most noteworthy sightseeing destinations in Coron town with the company of an English speaking guide. You will head up to Mt. Tapyas, the highest point in the area, where you can look out at the view deck and see a gorgeous panorama of the town. Then you'll visit the Maquinit Hot Springs, which have been made famous for their therapeutic properties. A stop at the public market will acquaint you with local colors and customs, as well as give you the opportunity to shop through the arts and crafts that are produced by the locals. The town plaza will give you a glimpse of what every day is like for people of Coron, and how they go about their days in such a tourist-famous town. Lualhati Park will be a great opportunity to get that riverside view of the town, standing at the dock and able to look out over the water. After some more free time to go souvenir shopping, you will head to the famous St. Augustine Church, where you'll learn of its historical background. You'll be able to then take a look into the locals' cashew harvest, which is one of the crucial factors of the local economy as the cashews are sent all over the Philippines as treats. There's more to Coron than its beaches, and this trip will show you its true town colors.

title: Bohol Whale Shark Interaction with Pahangog Twin Falls - Whole Day
description:
Swim with Whale Sharks and visit the gorgeous Pahangog Twin Falls in BoholEnjoy your tour with a sumptuous lunch at a seaside restaurantCombine two tours in 1 day! Experience the Whale Sharks at Lila, Bohol - you will be
picked up at your hotel and brought to Lila, Bohol. After a briefing on the guidelines, there is a 30 minute whale shark interaction upon boarding the paddle boat with a shared group. You may choose to view the whale sharks from the boat only or you can also swim with the whale sharks! The guide/boatmen will assist in taking photos of you using your device. After the whale shark interaction, lunch will be served at a seaside restaurant, after which you will be brought to the beautiful Pahangog Falls where you can swim in or just take in the views. From the parking lot, there is a 15 minute walk plus another 270 steps (estimated 15 min) climb to the waterfalls.

title: Manila Helicopter Tour
description:
Experience the luxury and sophistication of the vibrant Capital city with our exclusive aerial toursFrom the towering skyscrapers of Bonifacio Global City, our tours offer a glimpse into the rich culture and diversity of the PhilippinesFor 7 minutes you'll be exploring the Iconic buildings and magni?cent City skyline of Taguig, Makati, Mandaluyong and Pasig 
    See moreFrom above you'll see the many magnificent architectures of BGC from the tallest building in the Philippines - Grand Hyatt Hotel to the awe-inspiring Federal Land Tower. Our tours also take you to the breathtaking beauty of Metro Manila, for evening flyers you can witness the stunning sunset over the bay and visit the iconic BGC High Street from above. Join us and discover the magic of the National Capital Region.

title: Treasure Mountain Tour in Rizal
description:
Reward yourself with a relaxing trip to Treasure Mountain, the most famous no-hike mountain with an effortless sea of clouds and amazing view of Tanay, RizalThis tour is perfect for camping and sightseeing with your loved ones, families, friends, and even for solo travelers!Enjoy an outdoor dining experience and have a taste of their restaurant's silog breakfast and Filipino mealsYou can choose to simply unwind in the area or venture on various activities such as their Obstacle Course with Spider's Web Activity, Bosay Falls Trek, Maximinus Pool Swim, The Apiary Farm Visit, Laiban Falls Trek, El Patio Razon Visit, or Daranak Fall TrekThis tour is open-dated and is valid for 6 months upon booking 
    See more

title: Bacolod The Ruins, San Sebastian Cathedral, and City Tour
description:
Learn more about this activity's Enhanced Health & Hygiene MeasuresExplore Bacolod City and discover why it's known as the City of SmilesVisit tourist spots like the Ruins in Bacolod, San Sebastian Cathedral, Laguerta Vintage Glass Museum, and more!Learn about Don Mariano and Maria Braga Lacson and their ancestral mansion built in the 1900sListen to the history and cultural heritage of Bacolod city from your friendly local guideEnjoy the leisure and flexibility of this private group tour and the convenience of round-trip hotel transfers 
    See moreTake a private cultural tour of Bacolod and see some of the city's most popular tourist attractions. You will first visit San Sebastian Cathedral, a Roman Catholic Church built in the nineteenth century. Then, just outside the church, is the Bacolod Plaza, which hosts the majority of the city's public gatherings. You'll be served one of the city's specialties for lunch, chicken inasal, or barbeque chicken. Next on the itinerary are The Pope John Paul II Tower, the Gallery of Masks, the Laguerta Vintage Glasses Museum, and, finally, the most anticipated attraction, The Ruins in Talisay. Sugar baron Don Mariano Ledesma Lacson and his Portuguese wife, Maria Braga, own the mansion, which was built in the 1900s. It was purposefully burned down by Filipino guerrillas during WWII so that Japanese forces would not be able to use it as their headquarters. Fortunately, the strong walls and foundation survived and can now be visited by a large number of tourists.

title: Mount Purro Nature Reserve Day Tour in Antipolo
description:
Tucked in the foothills of Sierra Madre Mountain Range, Mount Purro Nature Reserve is your next sweet escape away from the busy city lifeHike, swim, and reconnect with nature as you try each fun-filled activity inside the nature reserveDelight yourself with a delicious and filling homecooked lunch buffet at Loli's KitchenBundle your day tour with your chosen pre-scheduled activities to maximize your experience!A distinct sustainable travel destination, make time to meet the indigenous Dumagat Tribe, one of the communities being empowered by the MPNR FoundationThis activity is open dated and is valid for 3 months from date of booking 
    See moreWith our fast-paced modern lives in the city, it's easy to forget that a quick trip to the mountains can help us relax and reflect on our daily routines. While urban life can be toxic, Metro Manila residents are fortunate that many nature destinations surround the city. Visit Mount Purro Nature Reserve in Antipolo and reward yourself with a relaxing escape. Nestled at the foot of the Sierra Madre Mountain Range, this forest trail sprawls across the location and links its guests to the surrounding wilderness. Explore the vast greens of the park with your English-speaking guide who will gladly take you to the highest point of the trail. You can also opt for a more calming experience beside the pool. In partnership with MPNR Foundation, every visit contributes to the dream of rehabilitating the Upper Marikina Watershed and empowering the indigenous Dumagat tribe. Don't forget to bring a camera with you to capture Instagram-worthy moments and sights as you stroll around the area.

title: Lakawon Island Day Tour from Bacolod
description:
Learn more about this activity's Enhanced Health & Hygiene MeasuresVisit Lakawon Island, known and frequented for its crystal clear waters and pure white sandExplore the banana-shaped island and go snorkeling, kayaking, or banana boat riding for fun day out in the sunSit in the shade of the palm trees or under the woven roofs of a cozy beachside cottageEnjoy a drink and sway on a hammock at TawHai floating bar, the largest floating bar in AsiaExperience the perfect island getaway filled with convenient modern amenities but without the large tourist crowds 
    See moreLakawon Island. It is a world class bech destination famous for its pristine white sand and crystal clear waters. While you're in here, you may want to enjoy water sports facilities of the island, or spend time on the Tawhai, the largest floating boat in Asia. "Tawhai" is the local word for "calm", and the cozy seats and daybeds around this floating bar, coupled with the island breeze, will give you exactly that. And don't worry about the food. The resort has a full-service restaurant.

title: Davao City Tour
description:
Explore the wonderful sights of Davao with this 1 Day Davao City Tour with round-trip transfersVisit must-see spots such as People's Park, Museo Dabawenyo, D'Bone Collector Museum and more!Don't forget to grab some special pasalubongs from Poblacion Pasalubong Center or munch on delicious streetfoods and local delicacies at Roxas Night MarketEnjoy a relaxing dinner with a gorgeous view of Davao at Jack Ridge Resort 
    See moreLife is here in Davao! Come, visit and experience Davao's melting pot of culture and be amazed with the city's colorful history, clean and green environment and the Dabawenyo's brand of hospitality with our 1 Day Davao City Tour. From a walk at the locals favorite People Park, to a must visit at Davao City Hall, Museo Dabawenyo, D' Bone Collector Musuem and the City Library. Enjoy the historic Japanese Tunnel or be captivated with the serenity of San Pedro Cathedral, Chinese Temple and Shrine of Holy Infant de Prague. Treat your loveones and friends with pasalubongs found only in Mindanao at Poblacion Pasalubong Center. And to cap the day, indulge yourself with a feast of fruits at Magsaysay Park Fruits Stand, or the best streetfoods and local delicacies at Roxas Night Market, or a relaxing dinner overlooking the beauty of Davao at Jack's Ridge Resort. Indeed, our Davao City Tour offers a diverse collection of sight, sounds, key attractions, adventures and sumptous food and fruit choices. Life is indeed here!

title: Siquijor Cambugahay Falls and Heritage Day Trip
description:
Experience a safe and hassle-free journey starting from and ending at your hotel in DumagueteEnjoy a private tour around Siquijor Island along with roundtrip ferry ticketsVisit centuries-old churches of Siquijor and peek into the religious traditions of localsTake a dip in the turquoise waters of Cambugahay Falls and see the famous 400+-year-old Balete TreeVisit the famed Triad Cafe for a stunning ocean view, with Negros and Bohol on the horizon 
    See moreAdventure travelers, look no further! Siquijor, best known to locals as an island shrouded in mystery and the supernatural, also boasts of undisturbed beaches and virgin forests. During the colonial period, the Spaniards referred to Siquijor as Isla del Fuego (Island of Fire) because of the luminiscence produced by swarms of fireflies nestled among the foliage of molave trees. It will definitely be worth your while to discover what this quaint island has to offer! You'll be picked up from your hotel in Dumaguete in the morning to go to the pier and board a ferry bound for Siquijor Island. After a ~90-minute journey, your island exploration begins with a quick stop at the St. Francis de Assisi Bell Tower and the St Vincent Bell Tower before heading up a hill to Triad Cafe for lunch. From the cafe, you can enjoy a panoramic view of the town of Larena and the surrounding islands of Negros and Cebu. Next is a rolling tour of the coastal towns of Enrique Villanueva and Maria, where Salagdoong Beach and Cang-Isok House are located. Your guide will then bring you to the town of Lazi, where you can take a refreshing swim at the Cambugahay Falls and later visit a huge Balete Tree, which is said to be over 400 years old and is believed by the locals to be enchanted. Finally, you'll be brought back to the Siquijor pier for your ferry ride to Dumaguete.

title: Private Cebu Rediscovery Tour
description:
Visit historical landmarks of Cebu on an exciting half-day tourSee Magellan's Cross, Fort San Pedro, Taoist Temple and moreMarvel at the intricate designs and oldest religious icons at the Santo Nino ChurchGet to the destination easily with convenient hotel pick up and drop off 
    See moreDiscover the oldest city in the Philippines on a fun half-day private tour with convenient hotel pick up and drop off. Founded all the way back in 1521, Cebu City is home to some of the most iconic historical landmarks. Here you can learn about Cebu's rich Spanish heritage and explore some of the most popular things to see in Cebu. Kick off your day early in the morning or opt for the afternoon tour which starts at 1:00pm. Start with a visit to Fort San Pedro and go on to see Plaza Sugbu, Magellan's Cross and Santo Nino Church. Regain your peace of mind at the quiet Taoist Temple and explore Magallanes Street, South Road Properties, Osmena Boulevard and other urban attractions. The trip concludes with the modern Asiatown IT Park & Ayala Business Park before you head back to your hotel.

title: 2 Day North Batan, South Batan, and Sabtang Island Tour
description:
Discover two of Batanes' main islands with this all-inclusive 2 day tour!Scale the lush landscape of Vayang Rolling Hills for a view of the sloping mountain ridgeBreathe in the fresh scent of the Pacific Ocean from South Batan's high rise Marlboro HillsImmerse yourself in the local culture as you visit traditional Ivatan houses in Sabtang IslandFeast on a sumptuous spread of classic Ivatan dishes for lunch throughout your tour 
    See morePlanning a trip to Batanes? Join this culturally immersive 2 day tour around two of its main islands! Kick off your holiday with a ride to the southern parts of Batan Island, where the winding roads lead to three major towns: Ivana, Mahatao, and Uyugan. Be surprised by each town's set of prided attractions - sights that go from cliffside viewpoints and vast grasslands, to ancient ruins and local must-sees. On your second day, cross the raging waters of the Pacific Ocean to Sabtang Island's white sand coastline. Enjoy the peaceful ambiance of the province and the unhurried attitude of the locals as you visit the traditional houses of Sinakan and Savidug. Enjoy your itinerary's scenic route and get to stop by emerald hills, pristine beaches, and historic sites. Hop on a boat back to Batan Island after lunch and find yourself in North Batan. Visit ruins of Catholic churches and more of Batanes' iconic plains and mountain ranges. Extend your sightseeing trip with a tour of Basco's town proper. End the day with a gorgeous view of the sunset at Basco Lighthouse.

title: Mt. Pulag Hiking Tour from Baguio
description:

title: Villa Escudero Day Tour from Manila by Vina Tour (????)
description:
Experience the allure of Filipino country life at Villa Escudero!Go on a quick weekend getaway at this farm resort on an air-conditioned transferRelish a Filipino buffet by the flowing stream of a man-made mini waterfallExperience a carabao cart ride and watch performances of traditional dances and musicMarvel at the preserved plantation house, chapel, and museum of religious artLearn from your English-speaking guide or avail of an optional Korean-speaking guide for your tour 
    See moreExperience the Philippines' old plantation life and learn about its rich cultural heritage in this tour of Villa Escudero. A convenient, refreshing escape from the hustle and bustle of Metro Manila, this farm resort offers visitors the local countryside life. Originally a coconut plantation, Villa Escudero now holds tours of their beautifully preserved plantation house, pink chapel, and museum, where the plantation owner's impressive personal collection of religious art can befound. Your local English-speaking guide will take you to every stop onboard a carabao cart. Enjoy a variety of fun-filled activities at the nearby green river, where you can go rafting or swimming. After an afternoon dip, head to the famous Waterfall Restaurant for a Filipino buffet lunch. Arrive at the foot of a man-made mini waterfall where your lunch buffet will be served. For a better experience, visit on weekends for a beautiful presentation of traditional Filipino dances. Book a tour now and experience the allure of Filipino country life at Villa Escudero!

title: Paragliding Experience in Montalban, Rizal
description:
Go out of your comfort zone and take a once in a lifetime experience with this paragliding adventure!This thrilling activity is located in Montalban, Rizal, just a quick drive away from the busy cityChoose between a morning or afternoon session and let the wind take you to see the breathtaking views of foothills of Southern Sierra MadreAll paragliding flights are safely tandemed with professional certified pilots from Monitor Gear, ensuring you of topmost fun and securityTick off this bucketlist-worthy experience and book it here on Klook!This activity is open-dated and is valid until December 31, 2024 
    See moreTick off another item in your bucket list and go out of your comfort zone when you try this once-in-a-lifetime experience in around Metro Manila. Conquer the sky and witness the stunning view of Metro Manila's skyline with a professional paragliding pilot. Soar through the air, with unmatched views of the city! The activity starts with a meet up with your instructor where he will familiarize you on how a glider works. After that, your instructor will provide you with the appropriate safety gear for your session. Then it's time to fly! Breathe in the fresh air and be in awe at the horizon as you fly up into the air.

title: Wonders of Anda Bohol Tour
description:
Enjoy a scenic tour of Can-umantad Falls and Cadapdapan Rice Terraces in CandijayHave a delightful lunch at the long white sand beach in AndaDrop by the mystic Lamanoc Island to explore its formation and swim in the cave pool 
    See moreThis tour starts and ends in Tagbilaran Bohol and features several unique experiences all in
one day. Visit the majestic Can-umantad Falls and Cadapdapan Rice Terraces in Candijay town, have lunch at the long white sand beach in Anda, visit the mystic Lamanoc Island with its rock shelter, caves with prehistoric hermatite paintings, ancient graveyard and boat coffins, go snorkeling and see the giant clams and coral gardens, and go for a swim and jump in a cave pool!

title: 2 Day North Batan and South Batan Tour
description:
See the verdant landscape of Batan Island in person with this 2 day tour!Set foot on the pathway to Vayang Rolling Hills' lush grasslands and when in North BatanGaze upon the strong waves of the Pacific Ocean from the top of Marlboro Hills at South BatanHave your fill of delicious Ivatan specialty dishes for lunch at Batan Island's local restaurantsExplore the entirety of the island on either a traditional tricycle or an air-conditioned transfer 
    See moreWhile foreigners are lounging by the white sand beaches of the Philippines, most locals are dreaming about the idyllic hilly landscape of Batanes. Discover why Filipinos are crowding over to the northernmost part of the country with this 2 day tour of Batan Island! Check out the main island of the province onboard a traditional tricycle for 3, or a standard van for up to 10 guests. Hop aboard and start your exploration with a visit to North Batan. Scale the extensive hills of the area, where Mt. Carmel Church, PAGASA Tukon Radar, Fundacion Pacita, Basco Idjang Viewing point, and Dipnaysupuan Japanese Tunnel are nestled deep within the sea of grass. Turn your feet towards the sea with a visit to Valugan Boulder Beach and return to land with a stop at Basco Town Proper. See the Provincial Capitol and Cathedral of Santo Domingo de Guzman before climbing back again to the iconic Vayang Rolling Hills and Naidi Hills, where the Basco Lighthouse lies nearby. On your second day, find yourself on the rugged cliffside roads of South Batan while traveling en route to the area's towns: Ivana, Mahatao, and Uyugan. Explore each town's attractions for a thorough visit of the area. End the tour with a ride back to your hotel.

title: Gigantes Islands with Sicogon Island Join In Day Tour from Iloilo
description:
Explore 6 extraodinary destinations in Gigantes Islands and Sicogon Island of Iloilo and be mesmirized by its magnificent limestone formations, natural pool lagoons, and pristine white sand beachesGet access to Sicogon Island's Buaya Beach and Tumakin Island that hosts a scenic view of Mt. Opao and a beautiful white beach with serene atmosphere to enjoyVisit the iconic Cabugao Gamay and be mesmirized by its powdery white sands and coconut trees best enjoyed from the island's view deckStop by Mini Boracay, a white sand beach that is comparable to the famous Boracay IslandTake advantage of the unlimited scallops at Lantangan Beach for a delicious lunch

Indulge in thrilling activities like snorkeling and cliff diving, followed by a delightful feast of native Filipino cuisine.

title: Puerto Princesa Underground River Tour and Ugong Rock Adventure with Zipline
description:
Explore Ugong Rock as your guide takes you rappelling and spelunking through the picturesque caveAscend Ugong Rock, which offers a panoramic view of the limestone formations and the jungle beneathBring out the daredevil in you as you descend on a 71 meter drop single-rider ziplineBe harnessed with top-of-the-line verticality and climbing gears, tools and equipmentExplore the Puerto Princesa Underground River National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage SiteSee one of the "New 7 Wonders of the World", the longest navigable subterranean riverLearn about the Underground River from your friendly guide and audio guides available in multiple languages!Enjoy a delectable lunch in Cacaoyan Restaurant 
    See moreGo on a day of exploration and thrilling adventures with this tour of Puerto Princesa's Underground River Tour and Ugong Rock Adventures. Experience a morning full of adrenaline rush as you explore and climb Ugong Rock, a massive moss-covered limestone formation with a gorgeous view of the mountains and the surrounding rice fields at the summit. You'll see beautiful untouched mineral deposits in the caves, right before you start climbing to the top. Once you reach the summit, you'll be treated to a panoramic views of the jungle and the limestone formations before testing your courage as you descend the Ugong Rock using the single-rider zipline with a 71 meter drop!
You'll then have a 20minute drive going to Sabang wharf to proceed to the Underground River, a UNESCO World Heritage Site known as the world's longest navigable subterranean river. Learn about the Underground River as you look around and witness the untouched beauty of nature as you gaze at the stalagmite and stalactite formations and even a 20-million year old fossil of a sea cow!
The tour ends with a delicious lunch right before you take the trip back to downtown Puerto Princesa.

title: Puerto Princesa Mt. Magarwak Sunrise Trekking
description: Enjoy a hike to the summit of Mt. Magarwak in Puerto Princesa and view the gorgeous sunrise that will make your climb worth itTake a picture of the sunset to make your tour a memorable oneThis trek in Mount Magarwak is a great choice if you're looking for something else to do in Puerto Princesa aside from visiting the beautiful beaches. Though it may be more suited for beginners, advanced mountain climbers will still want to give this a try just to see the view from the top of the mountain. Trek to 350 meters above sea-level to see one of the most beautiful sunrises in Palawan - few things can rival the serenity of watching the sunrise as the birds sing to greet the new morning, and this is exactly what awaits you in this tour. It will take you about an hour or so to reach the highest point of the mountain, but the guide will make it seem like it took no time at all! The peak shows you Palawan in a new perspective: sites such as Honda Bay, Puerto Princesa Bay, and Puerto Princesa City can be seen from this point. Once you reach the top of the mountain, you will be given a cup of locally-brewed coffee and hot pan de sal ("salt bread"), the most popular bread roll in the Philippines, which you consume as you rest and watch the sunrise. The pick up and drop off service makes the travel fast and easy, and you'll be back at your hotel before noon.

title: Gigantes Island Join In Day Tour from Iloilo
description:
Explore 6 amazing islands in Gigantes Islands of Iloilo and enjoy its magnificent limestone formations, natural pool lagoons, and pristine white sand beachesVisit the iconic Cabugao Gamay and be mesmirized by its powdery white sands and coconut trees best enjoyed from the island's view deckStop by Mini Boracay, a white sand beach that is comparable to the famous Boracay IslandTake advantage of the unlimited scallops at Lantangan Beach for a delicious lunch 
    See moreAre you ready for an unforgettable adventure? Embark on a journey of a lifetime in Islas De Gigantes, where you'll discover extraordinary wonders. Marvel at the breathtaking limestone formations, relax in a natural pool lagoon, and bask in the beauty of pristine white sand beaches. This place is beyond compare, leaving you speechless and in awe. Accompanied by a skilled boat captain, you'll visit the must-see highlights as well as hidden gems, perfect for swimming and unwinding along the coast of Cabugao Gamay. Indulge in thrilling activities like snorkeling and cliff diving, followed by a delightful feast of native Filipino cuisine.

title: Jet Ski Experience in Coron
description:
There's no better way to explore the gorgeous island of Coron than by an exhilarating Jet Ski ride!Challenge yourself by taking control of your very own watercraft on this adrenaline-fueled experience in CoronA professional and experienced Jet Ski tour guide will be there with you along the entire experienceEnjoy a 15-minute, 30-minute, or 60-minute ride as you explore at your own pace 
    See moreCoron isn't just about pristine beaches, naturally beautiful rock formations, jade-colored lakes lined heavily along limestone hills. The perfectly ensembled tropical island boasts crystal-clear emerald waters, soft tides, and a peek into the marine life residing under the sea. You can experience all of these on this wild Jet Ski adventure, an amazing combination of thrill-seeker leisure and relaxation made ultimately for your friends and family. Satisfy your adrenaline cravings as you Jet Ski your way into the waters of Coron's spectacular islets just across the wide open sea. Choose between the 30-minute or 1-hour packages and freely explore the seascape for miles and miles on this guided tour. This is an unforgettable adventure that lets you enjoy a few quick stops on different islands, just to leave a beautiful impression of Coron's smaller forelands to bring with you. A professional and experienced jetski operator will be there with you along the entire experience.

title: Cagsawa Ruins Tour from Legazpi
description:
Spend a day exploring one of the Philippines historic sites with a tour of the famed Cagsawa RuinsSee what remained of the town of Daraga after the violent Mayon Volcano eruption in 1814Stand in awe and appreciate the famed belfry, one of the last few landmarks of the townListen to interesting commentary about Cagsawa Church and Bicol province from your  English-speaking tour guideTravel with ease to Cagsawa Church to and from Legazpi with convenient round-trip transfers 
    See moreUncover the stories and history that lies beneath the remnants of Mayon Volcano's violent eruption with a tour of Cagsawa Ruins from Legazpi. Located in the small town of Daraga, venture into what is left of the 16th-century Francisican church, Cagsawa Church. Considered to be one of the significant events in the Philippines history, Cagsawa tells visitors the story of what truly happened during Mayon Volcano's eruption in 1814. Aside from Cagsawa Ruins, visit nearby popular locations like the Daraga Church and Lignon Hill Nature Park during the trip. You'll also be able to stop at the Pasalubong Center and get to take home some of the best souvenirs and treats from Bicol for your loved ones. Don't forget to bring your camera, so you'll be able to capture the awe-inspiring beauty of Mayon Volcano and the Bicol province while you travel.

title: Stand-up Paddle Board (SUP) Experience in Boracay
description:
Boracay is known for its incredibly clear waters perfect for a variety of aquatic activities. You can swim, snorkel, dive, and have an overall amazing vacation here in the Philippines! But if you prefer to slow down and just enjoy Boracay's calm currents, why not join this stand up paddle board experience?Glide on the pristine waters of Boracay and enjoy a fun and relaxing stand up paddleboard experienceYou can stand, sit, or even lie on your back and make the most out of your paddleboard!A local instructor will guide you through the process of stand up paddleboarding and you'll be paddling in no time!Bring your whole family along as this activity is perfect for both kids and adults! 
    See moreRegardless if you're an expert or a newbie, you'll be taught by an instructor so you can enjoy and make the most out of your paddleboard. Within minutes, you'll be able to sit, stand, lie on your back, and enjoy the sun while paddleboarding! No need to worry too if you have younger ones in tow as this activity is also fit for kids. Choose between a 30-minute or 1-hour experience and become a stand up paddleboard expert in Boracay!

title: Oslob Whaleshark Watching & Sumilon Island Day Tour
description:
Explore the paradise of Sumilon Island before heading off to see the local whale sharks in Oslob!You can swim and snorkel with whale sharks and even participate in the feedingFrom the sea to the shores: explore the coral reefs and climb up the amazing Tumalog FallsEnjoy many activities such as kayaking, nature trekking, snorkeling, fish feeding in Bluewater Sumilon Island ResortYou'll head to your adventures and back with convenient roundtrip transfers for hotels in Cebu and Mactan! 
    See moreSumilon Island is one of Cebu's shining jewels as an idyllic beach paradise that is full of amazing sightseeing destinations. And it sits not far from Oslob, famous all over the world for the opportunity to go whale shark watching! This day tour will take you to both splendid worlds, allowing you to enjoy the amazing wonders over and under the water. Your day starts with a trip to Oslob itself, where you'll be able to swim with the whale sharks, the largest fish in the world. You'll get the chance to snorkel and feed these gentle giants before you head off to a cooling trip to Tumalog Falls. Under the pounding waters, you'll feel refreshed enough to head for Sumilon Island itself, and you'll be able to swim, snorkel, and study a huge array of gorgeous marine species in Bluewater Sumilon Island Resort. This is an amazing opportunity to see the most beautiful underwater sights around Cebu.

title: Banana Boat Ride and Clear Kayak Experience in Coron
description:

    See moreCoron isn't just about the pristine beaches, naturally beautiful rock formations, jade-colored lakes lined heavily along limestone hills. The perfectly ensembled tropical island boasts crystal-clear emerald waters, soft tides, and a peek into the beautiful marine life residing under the sea. title: Catanduanes Binurong Point and Puraran Surf Beach Day Trip
description:
Experience adventure and relaxation on an exciting private trip to explore the sights and landmarks of CatanduanesBe in awe at breathtaking views of Catanduanes' eastern coast from the highest point in BalacayGet a chance to see one of the few Doppler radars in the country at the PAG-ASA RadarStop by the Museo De Catanduanes and immerse yourself in the history and rich culture of the islandListen to fascinating stories and facts as you explore with trip's option for a professional guideTravel with ease from location to location with a convenient private transfer service to and from your hotel in Virac 
    See moreEnjoy a combination of adventure and relaxation in this beautiful Island in the Philippines. Visit the picturesque Binurong and Balacay point, and take an overlooking view of the eastern coast of Catanduanes. Relax in the fine sands of Puraran or opt for a some surfing. Get to see one of the few Doppler radars in the country, and learn about the history and rich culture of the island in a quick stop at the Museo De Catanduanes.
