title: Highlands Tour in Davao
description:
Enjoy breathtaking views in Davao with this 1 Day Davao Highlands Tour with roundtrip transfersVisit destinations with picturesque views of clouds and hills at Hills View Mountain Villa, Sonnen Berg Mountain View, Seagull Mountain Resort and more!Pick some strawberries or vegetables at BEMWA FarmChill and dine at Highway 81 known for its sumptuous food and cold weather 
    See moreLife is here in Davao! Come, visit and experience Davao's melting pot of culture and be amazed with the city's colorful history, clean and green environment and the Dabawenyo's brand of hospitality with our 1 Day Davao Highlands Tour. Be one with nature and indulge in its grandest with a breathtaking and overlooking view of the clouds and of the green hills and mountains at Hills View Mountain Villa, Sonnen Berg Sea of Clouds and JMCC Peak. Or indulge in an authentic mountain experience marked with cool crisp of mountain air with Seagull Mountain Resort and if you feel like it, take a dip at their famous cold pool! Or take your best shot at Instagram-worthy Greek Hills! As the name suggests, the resort is inspired by the popular features of Greece like ¡EEEEÅEEEEPortara¡EEEEÅEEEE or the Great Door and other more attractions! These, plus a chilly weather that's perfect for strawberry and vegetable picking at BEMWA Farm! And to cap the day off, chill and relax at the laidback and serene Highway 81 for good food and cold weather. But don' forget to pose at the Big Eagle Statue along the highway of Buda! Indeed, our Davao City Highlands Tour offers a diverse collection of sight, sounds, key attractions, adventures and sumptous food and fruit choices. Life is indeed here!

title: Oslob Whale Shark Swimming and Paragliding Experience
description:
Tick off a bucketlist experience: swim and snorkel with whale sharks in the PhilippinesSoar through the air and get a bird's eye view of the beautiful CebuA rewarding and unforgettable view is waiting during a tandem paragliding flight in Oslob 
    See moreTick off your bucket list for an amazing adventure in Oslob. Your day starts very early as you are picked up in your hotel for breakfast in Oslob, and then it's right into the water to go whale shark watching and snorkeling with these gentle giants.
Strap on the necessary safety gear and take off with a professional paragliding tandem pilot into blue skies. Touch the sky and feel the wind in your hair as you glide above Oslob's natural wonders. Revel in the feeling of extreme adrenaline rush and the beauty of your surroundings before landing. Definitely a must try experience on Klook!

description:

because of the reddish rocks surrounding the fallsTake a refreshing swim, while enjoying the natural, cool environment provided by the compostion of the FallsNext, head to the hot springs for that therapeutic dip followed by a lunch at Forest Camp, a 2.5 hectare valley resort with indigenous forest trees, and natural and man-made spring swimming pools to end this tourThis activity is open-dated and is valid for 6 months from date of booking 
    See more

title: University Guided Walking Tour in Baguio
description:
Grab this chance to visit the five (5) famous universities in Baguio City!Have a quick stop at Burnham Park for strawberry taho and ice cream, and then try the boating experience in Burnham LakeSee the city's oldest restaurant - Luisa's Cafe along Session Road and down to the city market's parking - Malcolm Square 
    See moreVisit five of Baguio City's most renowned universities. Prepare to travel back in time and relive your student experience while being accompanied by knowledgeable tour guides. Visit the storied Baguio Convention Center to begin your adventure, then proceed to your first destination, the University of the Philippines Baguio (UP Baguio). The tour continues as it passes by the University of the Cordilleras(UC).

title: Burnham Park Guided Walking Tour
description:
Capture the beauty of Burnham Park and go for a swan boat ride at Burnham Lagoon!Get your daily dose of fresh flowers at nearby flower shops. Don't miss out on Baguio's abundant roses, marigolds, daisies, and hollyhocks as they are hard to come by in other parts of the country.Set up your picnic spot and unwind at the Picnic Grove or check out the Rose Garden. You may also visit veterans' park, Japanese Peace Tower, and "Pine Tress of the World".Pick several activities available ranging from boating, jogging, biking, and even skating! 
    See more

title: Cambuhat River Cruise and Oyster Farm Tour in Bohol
description:
Enjoy a paddle boat ride along Cambuhat River and an eco tour of the Oyster FarmMunch on a delightful seafood lunch with fresh oysters served by the riverGet a chance to learn about oyster culture from community members that care of the farm 
    See moreA relaxing Eco tour in Buenavista town, approximately 2 hours away from Tagbilaran City
Bohol. This Eco-tour starts off with a paddle boat ride through the winding river passing through mangroves and culminating at the oyster farm and visitor's center on the bank of the river. Then a hearty lunch of oysters, oyster cake and other seafood will be served by the river. After lunch, there will be an explanation on oyster culture and the management of the river and mangroves by the community members. They will also present song and dance numbers. On the way back there's an optional visit to a weaving shop/souvenir shop, and optional shopover at Punta Cruz Watchtower, a curious triangular watchtower built in 1796 as a lookout against pirates and Muslim marauders. The watchtower overlooks the seas south of Bohol where you can see the islands of Cebu, Siquijor and Mindanao.

title: Gigantes Islands All In Package from Iloilo
description:
Enjoy this Ultimate Gigantes Islands All In Package with island hopping, private accommodations, and hassle-free transfers from IloiloVisit 6 wondrous destinations in Gigantes Islands of Iloilo and be mesmirized by its magnificent limestone formations, natural pool lagoons, and pristine white sand beachesOpt for a restful stay at Gigantes Islands Backpacker Guesthouse in Lantangan Beach where you can enjoy the beach and munch on unlimited scallopsVisit the iconic Cabugao Gamay and be mesmirized by its powdery white sands and coconut trees best enjoyed from the island's view deckStop by Mini Boracay, a white sand beach that is comparable to the famous Boracay Island 
    See moreAre you ready for an unforgettable adventure? Embark on a journey of a lifetime in Islas De Gigantes, where you'll discover extraordinary wonders. Marvel at the breathtaking limestone formations, relax in a natural pool lagoon, and bask in the beauty of pristine white sand beaches. This place is beyond compare, leaving you speechless and in awe. Accompanied by a skilled boat captain, you'll visit the must-see highlights as well as hidden gems, perfect for swimming and unwinding along the coast of Cabugao Gamay. Indulge in thrilling activities like snorkeling and cliff diving, followed by a delightful feast of native Filipino cuisine.
